data.prayer: Father, help the 42,505 believers in Zhaotong to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Zhaotong, Yunnan, China
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Zhaotong. Through your servants plant 112 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of Zhaotong, Yunnan, China that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Zhaotong, Yunnan, China. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Aluo people might believe through him.
Spirit, guide someone in the church in the county of Zhaotong to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.prayer: Please, teach the 42,505 believers in Zhaotong, Yunnan, China how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.

data.section_summary:
the county of Zhaotong, Yunnan, China has a population of 560,300.

We estimate Zhaotong has 42,505 people who might know Jesus, 9,052 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 508,743 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, we pray that the people of Zhaotong, Yunnan, China will learn to study the Bible, understand it, obey it, and share it.

location.name: Zhaotong
